# textualRange

**Instance Property**

The range of the field’s text content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var textualRange: UITextRange { get }
```

## Discussion

Both tokens and text are included in the range from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/beginningOfDocument] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput/endOfDocument]. This property provides convenient access to just the text.

## Converting text into tokens

- **replaceTextualPortion(of:with:at:)**: Converts text in a search field into a search token.
